# Ruby


## ruby without link

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)]
.
<p><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢(ㄏㄢˋ)字(ㄗˋ)]
.
<p><ruby>漢<rt>ㄏㄢˋ</rt></ruby><ruby>字<rt>ㄗˋ</rt></ruby></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)][]
.
<p><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby>[]</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)][link]
.
<p><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby>[link]</p>
````````````````````````````````

## ruby with link

```````````````````````````````` example
[link]: /url

[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)][link]
.
<p><a href="/url"><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby></a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)]()
.
<p><a href=""><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby></a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢字(ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ)](/url)
.
<p><a href="/url"><ruby>漢字<rt>ㄏㄢˋㄗˋ</rt></ruby></a></p>
````````````````````````````````

## ruby splits

```````````````````````````````` example
[漢(かん)][字(じ)]
.
<p><ruby>漢<rt>かん</rt></ruby><ruby>字<rt>じ</rt></ruby></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[[漢(かん)][字(じ)]](https://jisho.org/search/漢字)
.
<p><a href="https://jisho.org/search/%E6%BC%A2%E5%AD%97"><ruby>漢<rt>かん</rt></ruby><ruby>字<rt>じ</rt></ruby></a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[汉字(hàn zì)]
.
<p><ruby>汉字<rt>hàn zì</rt></ruby></p>
````````````````````````````````
